items.summary:
Through the official Govee Amazon storefront, you can now score the best price to date on the RGBIC Cylinder Floor Lamp at $94.99 shipped. It’s dropping down from its $170 full price here, which we’ve only ever seen go as low as $100 in the past. Now, for as long as this deal lasts, you’ll be getting a larger-than-ever 44% markdown that cuts $75 off the going rate, landing it at a new all-time low price. We’ve also collected a number of alternate floor lamps and an outdoor lamp post below that are benefiting from discounts right now.

Amazon is currently offering a Lightning sale on the Razor Rambler 16 e-bike for $525 shipped in its black colorway. It’s dropping down from a $700 full price here, which we’ve only seen go as low as $548 over the last year. items.title: Bluetti’s RV Power sale drops Elite 200 v2 station bundled with latest Charger 2 to new $1,044 low (Reg. $2,298), more from $449
items.summary:
Bluetti is celebrating more nomadic lifestyles with its latest RV Power Sale that is taking up to 53% off its power stations, bundles, and appropriate accessories – plus, there are a few exclusive bonus savings codes available to score even lower prices. Among the charging-on-the-go bundles, a notable inclusion is the brand’s Elite 200 v2 Portable Power Station with an Alternator & Solar Dual DC Charger 2 at $1,044.05 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS5OFF at checkout, which has no matching bundle at Amazon, but you can find the standalone station there for $899. We saw this bundle included as part of the Charger 2 launch deals back in January carrying a $2,298 full price and dropping down to $1,049 with discounts, which has remained the lowest tracked price up until today. Now, you’ll be getting a combined 55% markdown for $1,254 savings that lands it down at a new all-time low price. You can also get the station on its own for $854.05 shipped, after using the same code above. Head below to see the full lineup of deals while this event lasts.
